[[inst_hl_lbui]]
==== HL.LBUI

*Syntax:* hl.lbui [SrcL, simm], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_lbui.svg[HL.LBUI encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/LONG
